name: acids, fatty, unsaturated (C18), dimers, non hydrogenated, distilled and non-distilled
SMLTrestrictions: G18 Group Restriction No. 18 corresponds to FCM substance No. 705,733. Group restriction specification is expressed as the sum of the substances.
NotesCompliance: V1 Verification of compliance by residual content per food contact surface area (QMA) pending the availability of an analytical method.
ExpressedAs: As the sum of the substances
